Package solution.listadt

Interface ListADT<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListADTImpl
    public interface ListADT<T>
    This interface represents a generic list. It is a generalization of the BookListADT interface. We represent the type of data that this will work with a generic parameter T. This is a placeholder for the actual data type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(int index, T b)
      Add an object to this list so that it occupies the provided index.
      void addBack​(T b)
      Add an object to the back of this list (so it is the last object in the list.
      void addFront​(T b)
      Add an object to the front of this list.
      T get​(int index)
      Get the (index)th object in this list.
      int getSize()
      Return the number of objects currently in this list.
      <R> ListADT<R> map​(java.util.function.Function<T,​R> converter)
      A general purpose map higher order function on this list, that returns the corresponding list of type R.
      void remove​(T b)
      Remove the first instance of this object from this list.

    • Method Detail

      • addFront

        void addFront​(T b)
        Add an object to the front of this list.
        Parameters:
        b - the object to be added to the front of this list.

      • addBack

        void addBack​(T b)
        Add an object to the back of this list (so it is the last object in the list.
        Parameters:
        b - the object to be added to teh back of this list.

      • add

        void add​(int index,
         T b)
        Add an object to this list so that it occupies the provided index. Index begins with 0.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to be occupied by this object, beginning at 0.
        b - the object to be added to the list.

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Return the number of objects currently in this list.
        Returns:
        the size of the list.

      • remove

        void remove​(T b)
        Remove the first instance of this object from this list.
        Parameters:
        b - the object to be removed.

      • get

        T get​(int index)
throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get the (index)th object in this list.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the object to be returned.
        Returns:
        the object at the given index.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid index is passed.

      • map

        <R> ListADT<R> map​(java.util.function.Function<T,​R> converter)
        A general purpose map higher order function on this list, that returns the corresponding list of type R.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of data in the resulting list.
        Parameters:
        converter - the function that converts T into R.
        Returns:
        the resulting list that is identical in structure to this list, but has data of type R.
